pyqgis_plugin.name: QP Checker
pyqgis_plugin.description: QP Checker is a QGIS plugin that allows users to streamline layer management by renaming, applying styles, and arranging base layers in a QGIS project. It includes functionality for selecting QML and QGS files, applying QML styles to specific layers, and organizing base layers in a specified order.
pyqgis_plugin.about: QP Checker is a QGIS plugin that allows users to streamline layer management by renaming, applying styles, and arranging base layers in a QGIS project. It includes functionality for selecting QML and QGS files, applying QML styles to specific layers, and organizing base layers in a specified order.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Error List Checker
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin allows users to validate geospatial data by checking for discrepancies in facility names and sector categories. It generates a detailed error list for review.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The Error List Checker plugin provides an intuitive interface for validating attributes within geospatial data layers in QGIS. Users can select layers, specify validation criteria, and generate an error list for facilities that do not meet the required conditions.

pyqgis_plugin.name: AuQCBMS
pyqgis_plugin.description: AuQCBMS is a QGIS plugin that streamlines mapping tasks with easy styling, filtering by geocode, and organized layer exports.
pyqgis_plugin.about: AuQCBMS enables GIS users to apply QML styles, filter layers by geocode, and export selected layers into a structured output folder based on geocode selections.

pyqgis_plugin.name: QML Updater
pyqgis_plugin.description: The QML Updater plugin helps QGIS users quickly download and update QML files from a GitHub repository. Select a folder, start the update, and monitor progress with a progress bar. The plugin saves your folder choice for future use, ensuring your QML styles stay current.
pyqgis_plugin.about: QML Updater plugin for QGIS lets you easily update QML files from a GitHub repository. Simply select a folder, and the plugin will download the latest QML files, keeping your styles up-to-date. It features a progress bar and error handling for a smooth experience.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Query Manager
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin lets users build, test, and save SQL queries for QGIS layers, improving workflow and data analysis. It allows quick query creation, storage, and reuse.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Query Builder and Manager is a QGIS plugin that helps users easily create and manage SQL queries for layers.
